parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or lunge forward, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the transmission needs to be worked on frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the transmission can cause excessive acceleration downhill, tailgating, and/or excessive brake component wear, which can lead to accidents or reduce vehicle safety.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transaxle Controllers and Speed Sensors Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of transaxle controllers and speed sensors can cause transmission problems, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The defective axle can cause transmission problems, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to become stuck in one gear, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The transmission is stuck in one gear

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The ignition lock failure can cause the vehicle to overheat, not shut off, and potentially lead to fires, resulting in injuries or accidents.
symptoms: the vehicle will not shut off

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to replace the camshaft position sensor as required by the recall campaign can lead to engine performance issues, decreased fuel efficiency, and potential engine damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Build Quality and Repair Reliability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The overall poor build quality and repair reliability can lead to numerous roadside failures, which can be unsafe and cause inconvenience to the driver.
Tire tread separation and cracking can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: Tire tread comes off or separates while driving
cracks appear on the tire surface
tire failure occurs despite having good tread depth.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of tire manufacturers to honor warranty claims can leave consumers with unsafe vehicles and financial burdens, leading to a loss of trust in the manufacturer and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Tire manufacturers or dealers refuse to replace defective tires under warranty
consumers are left with the cost of replacement
and inadequate support is provided to address tire safety concerns.
